__e: She showed me a kindness and I thought to return it.
And I thought I was gonna get that back, but you just used me.
Can't you see that everything I've done has been about trying to repay him?
If you manage to find a woman again, I'll be glad to return the favor.
I've heard that before, so... Maybe a little bit of him wants to return the favor, but it's that little bit that makes him so valuable. Don't you see?
But I did spend a lot of years helping out men, and now... there is a woman in that room struggling in the same way you did when we first met and this is your chance to, you know,
You defend yourself in despair. You feel you can't return it.
So, you give that girl half a chance, maybe she can do the same for you.
